name: Catalog Management Service
description: Microservice for creating, editing, deleting, and publishing DXP sites. Communicates with dandelion to retrieve product data, create and update target schemas and channels. Receives ECP-enhanced channel publishes from ECP gateway via Kafka, triggers generation of static websites, and uploads them to CDN.

name: Digital Experience Platform (Salsify Sites)
description: Salsify's platform for creating and publishing digital catalog sites. Also referred to as 'Sites' or 'Salsify Sites'. The catalog-management-service is the backend microservice that powers DXP functionality.

name: Dandelion
description: Internal Salsify service that provides product data, target schema management, and channel operations. The catalog-management-service communicates with dandelion to retrieve product data and manage target schemas and channels.

name: Enhanced Content Publishing
description: System for enhanced channel publishing. The catalog-management-service receives ECP-enhanced channel publishes from the ECP gateway via Kafka.

name: DXP Catalog Website
description: Next.js frontend UI for catalog sites, contained within the catalog-management-service repository. Used to build and render the static websites for DXP/Sites.
